extensions.name: DevLens
extensions.desc: Quickly inspect page layouts and visualize element boundaries.

extensions.name: StyleSpy
extensions.desc: Instantly analyze and copy CSS from any webpage element.

extensions.name: SpeedBoost
extensions.desc: Optimizes browser usage to accelerate page loading.

extensions.name: JSONWizard
extensions.desc: Formats, validates, and prettifies JSON responses in-browser.

extensions.name: TabMaster Pro
extensions.desc: Organizes browser tabs into groups and sessions.

extensions.name: ViewportBuddy
extensions.desc: Simulates various screen resolutions directly within the browser.

extensions.name: Markup Notes
extensions.desc: Enables annotation and notes directly onto webpages for collaborative debugging.

extensions.name: GridGuides
extensions.desc: Overlay customizable grids and alignment guides on any webpage.

extensions.name: Palette Picker
extensions.desc: Instantly extracts color palettes from any webpage.

extensions.name: LinkChecker
extensions.desc: Scans and highlights broken links on any page.

extensions.name: DOM Snapshot
extensions.desc: Capture and export DOM structures quickly.

extensions.name: ConsolePlus
extensions.desc: Enhanced developer console with advanced filtering and logging.
